translationStyleDescriptions.natural: Translate naturally and fluently, suitable for everyday contexts. Prioritizes flow and readability. üòä
translationStyleDescriptions.formal: Translate in a formal, polite style, suitable for work, academic, or official texts. üé©
translationStyleDescriptions.casual: Translate in a friendly, casual style, suitable for everyday conversations or personal messages. üòÑ
translationStyleDescriptions.literal: Translate as close to the original meaning as possible, preserving structure and every word. Suitable for technical documents. üìù
translationStyleDescriptions.creative: Translate creatively and flexibly, adapting expressions to fit the target culture. Suitable for marketing content. üé®
translationStyleDescriptions.technical: Translate specialized technical content, preserving professional terminology with high accuracy. Suitable for IT and scientific documents. ‚öôÔ∏è
translationStyleDescriptions.poetic: Translate literature and poetry, focusing on rhythm, rhyme, and emotion. Suitable for artistic works. üé≠
translationStyleDescriptions.commercial: Translate for commercial purposes, marketing, and sales. Focus on persuasiveness and customer appeal. üíº
translationStyleDescriptions.academic: Translate in an academic, scientific style, using precise terminology and clear logical structure. üéì
translationStyleDescriptions.news: Translate in journalistic style, neutral, objective, concise, and easy to understand for the general public. üì∞

emoticonOptionDescriptions.keep-original: Keep all existing emoticons/emojis from the original text without adding or changing them üîÑ
emoticonOptionDescriptions.add-contextual: Add emoticons/emojis that match the content and emotions of the text to increase liveliness üòä‚ú®
emoticonOptionDescriptions.remove-all: Remove all emoticons/emojis to create clean, formal text üö´
emoticonOptionDescriptions.localize: Replace emoticons/emojis with symbols appropriate for the target language culture üåç
emoticonOptionDescriptions.enhance-emotional: Add many emoticons/emojis to highlight and amplify emotions in the text üí´‚ù§Ô∏è
emoticonOptionDescriptions.minimal-subtle: Only add a few subtle emoticons/emojis, suitable for gentle style ‚ú®
emoticonOptionDescriptions.youth-friendly: Use trendy, modern emoticons/emojis suitable for young people ü§©üî•
emoticonOptionDescriptions.professional-warm: Balance professionalism and friendliness with moderate emoticons/emojis ü§ùüòä
emoticonOptionDescriptions.kawaii-cute: Use Japanese kawaii-style emoticons/emojis, focusing on cuteness ü•∞üíñ
emoticonOptionDescriptions.text-emoticons: Convert emojis to ASCII text emoticons like :) ^_^ ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø :-)
emoticonOptionDescriptions.seasonal-themed: Add emoticons/emojis appropriate for the current season or special occasions üå∏üéÑ

emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.never: Don't add new emoticons/emojis. Only keep what's already in the original text. üö´
emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.very-rare: Only add emoticons/emojis when really necessary to clarify meaning or avoid misunderstanding. ‚ö™
emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.rare: Add emoticons/emojis sparingly, only in the most important cases. üîµ
emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.occasional: Add emoticons/emojis occasionally to make text more lively while maintaining professionalism. üü°
emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.moderate: Balance between adding emoticons/emojis and keeping text natural. Moderate level. üü†
emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.frequent: Add emoticons/emojis fairly often to create lively and friendly text. üü¢
emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.very-frequent: Use emoticons/emojis frequently to create very lively text with rich emotions. üî¥
emoticonFrequencyDescriptions.maximum: Add emoticons/emojis whenever possible to achieve maximum liveliness and emotion. üåà‚ú®

optimizationRecommendations.nullableFieldsRecommendation: Table has many nullable fields ({{nullableCount}}/{{totalCount}}). Consider reordering columns to optimize null bitmap.
optimizationRecommendations.overheadFieldsRecommendation: {{highOverheadCount}}/{{totalCount}} fields have high overhead. Consider reviewing data types and padding.

previewExample.tableofcontents:
- [General Summary](#general-summary)
- [Goals & Scope](#goals--scope)
- [Architecture](#architecture)
- [Main Components](#main-components)
- [Deployment Guide](#deployment-guide)
- [Usage Guide](#usage-guide)
- [Related Documents](#related-documents)
- [Authors & Change History](#authors--change-history)
previewExample.generalsummary: This project delivers a comprehensive e-commerce platform with AI-powered recommendations, real-time inventory management, and advanced analytics capabilities. The system integrates payment processing, order management, and customer service automation to provide a seamless shopping experience.
previewExample.goalsscope:
**Goals:**
- Implement scalable e-commerce architecture
- Integrate AI-powered product recommendations
- Automate inventory and order management

**Scope:**
- Web and mobile applications
- Payment gateway integration
- Analytics dashboard

**Out of Scope:**
- Physical logistics management
- Third-party marketplace integration
previewExample.architecture:
The system follows a microservices architecture pattern with:
- Frontend: React/Next.js application
- Backend: Node.js microservices
- Database: PostgreSQL with Redis caching
- Message Queue: RabbitMQ for async processing
- AI Services: Python-based recommendation engine
previewExample.maincomponents:
**Core Components:**
1. **User Management Service** - Authentication and user profiles
2. **Product Catalog Service** - Product information and search
3. **Order Management Service** - Order processing and fulfillment
4. **Payment Service** - Payment processing and billing
5. **AI Recommendation Engine** - Personalized product suggestions
6. **Analytics Service** - Business intelligence and reporting
previewExample.deploymentguide:
**Prerequisites:**
- Docker and Kubernetes cluster
- PostgreSQL database
- Redis cache

**Deployment Steps:**
1. Clone the repository
2. Configure environment variables
3. Deploy using Helm charts
4. Run database migrations
5. Configure monitoring and alerting
previewExample.authorschangehistory:
**Authors:**
- John Doe - Lead Developer
- Jane Smith - Product Manager

**Change History:**
- v1.0.0 - Initial release (2024-01-15)
- v1.1.0 - Added AI recommendations (2024-02-01)
- v1.2.0 - Mobile app support (2024-03-01)
previewExample.overview: This technical specification outlines the architecture and implementation details for an AI-powered e-commerce platform. The system provides scalable, secure, and efficient online shopping capabilities with advanced AI-driven features.
previewExample.architecturedesign:
**System Architecture:**
```
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ   Frontend  ‚îÇ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÇ   Gateway   ‚îÇ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÇ  Services   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ React/Next  ‚îÇ    ‚îÇ   (Nginx)   ‚îÇ    ‚îÇ Microservices‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
```

**Component Relationships:**
- API Gateway handles routing and load balancing
- Microservices communicate via message queues
- Database per service pattern for data isolation
previewExample.technicalrequirements:
**Performance Requirements:**
- Response time: < 200ms for API calls
- Throughput: 10,000 concurrent users
- Availability: 99.9% uptime

**Security Requirements:**
- OAuth 2.0 authentication
- End-to-end encryption
- PCI DSS compliance for payments
previewExample.implementationdetails:
**Technology Stack:**
- Frontend: React 18, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express, TypeScript
- Database: PostgreSQL, Redis
- Infrastructure: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS

**API Design:**
RESTful APIs with OpenAPI 3.0 specification
previewExample.testingstrategy:
**Testing Framework:**
- Unit Tests: Jest, React Testing Library
- Integration Tests: Supertest
- E2E Tests: Cypress
- Performance Tests: k6

**Coverage Requirements:**
- Unit tests: >90%
- Integration tests: Critical paths
- Security testing: OWASP compliance
previewExample.deploymentoperations:
**Infrastructure:**
- Kubernetes cluster on AWS EKS
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions
- Monitoring: Prometheus, Grafana
- Logging: ELK Stack

**Operational Procedures:**
- Automated deployments via GitOps
- Blue-green deployment strategy
- Database backup and recovery
previewExample.introduction: Welcome to the AI-Powered E-Commerce Platform! This comprehensive solution provides everything you need to build and manage a modern online store with intelligent features that enhance the shopping experience.
previewExample.gettingstarted:
**Quick Setup:**
1. Create your account
2. Set up your store profile
3. Add your first products
4. Configure payment methods
5. Launch your store!

**What You Need:**
- Valid business license
- Bank account for payments
- Product catalog
previewExample.featuresoverview:
**üõçÔ∏è Core Features:**
- Product catalog management
- Shopping cart and checkout
- Payment processing
- Order management

**ü§ñ AI Features:**
- Personalized recommendations
- Smart search
- Inventory optimization
- Customer insights
previewExample.stepbysteptutorials:
**Tutorial 1: Adding Your First Product**
1. Navigate to Products ‚Üí Add New
2. Fill in product details
3. Upload product images
4. Set pricing and inventory
5. Publish the product

**Tutorial 2: Setting Up Payments**
1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Payments
2. Connect your payment gateway
3. Configure tax settings
4. Test the payment flow
previewExample.advancedusage:
**Advanced Customization:**
- Custom themes and branding
- Advanced analytics and reporting
- API integrations
- Custom workflows

**Power User Tips:**
- Use bulk operations for efficiency
- Set up automated rules
- Leverage AI insights for optimization
previewExample.troubleshooting:
**Common Issues:**

**Q: Products not showing up?**
A: Check that products are published and inventory is available.

**Q: Payment failures?**
A: Verify payment gateway configuration and test credentials.

**Q: Slow performance?**
A: Check your internet connection and clear browser cache.

**Need Help?**
- Email: support@example.com
- Live Chat: Available 24/7
- Documentation: docs.example.com
previewExample.apioverview:
This API provides comprehensive access to our e-commerce platform functionality. Use it to integrate with external systems, build custom applications, or automate business processes.

**Base URL:** `https://api.example.com/v1`
**Authentication:** Bearer token required
**Rate Limit:** 1000 requests per hour
previewExample.authentication:
**Authentication Methods:**
- API Key authentication
- OAuth 2.0 with PKCE
- JWT tokens

**Example Request:**
```bash
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  https://api.example.com/v1/products
```
previewExample.endpointsreference:
**Core Endpoints:**

`GET /products` - List all products
`POST /products` - Create new product
`GET /products/{id}` - Get product details
`PUT /products/{id}` - Update product
`DELETE /products/{id}` - Delete product

**Request Format:**
```json
{
  "name": "Product Name",
  "price": 29.99,
  "category": "electronics"
}
```
previewExample.changelogversioning:
**API Versions:**
- v1.0 - Initial release (2024-01-01)
- v1.1 - Added bulk operations (2024-02-01)
- v1.2 - Enhanced search capabilities (2024-03-01)

**Breaking Changes:**
- v1.1: Product creation requires category field
- v1.2: Search endpoint URL changed

**Migration Guide:**
Update your API calls to include the required category field for product creation.
previewExample.executivesummary:
**Project Overview:**
The AI-Powered E-Commerce Platform represents a strategic investment in digital transformation, delivering a modern, scalable solution that will drive revenue growth and customer engagement.

**Business Impact:**
- Projected 30% increase in conversion rates
- 50% reduction in operational costs
- Enhanced customer satisfaction

**Investment:** $500K over 6 months
**Expected ROI:** 200% within first year
previewExample.projectscope:
**Key Deliverables:**
- Fully functional e-commerce platform
- Mobile applications (iOS/Android)
- Admin dashboard
- Analytics and reporting system

**Success Criteria:**
- Platform supports 10,000 concurrent users
- 99.9% uptime achievement
- Sub-200ms response times

**Constraints:**
- Budget: $500,000
- Timeline: 6 months
- Team size: 8 developers
previewExample.timelinemilestones:
**Project Timeline:**

**Phase 1 (Months 1-2):** Foundation
- Infrastructure setup
- Core backend services
- Database design

**Phase 2 (Months 3-4):** Development
- Frontend development
- API implementation
- Payment integration

**Phase 3 (Months 5-6):** Launch
- Testing and QA
- Performance optimization
- Production deployment
previewExample.resourcesbudget:
**Team Structure:**
- 1 Project Manager
- 2 Senior Developers
- 3 Full-stack Developers
- 1 UI/UX Designer
- 1 DevOps Engineer

**Budget Breakdown:**
- Development: $350K (70%)
- Infrastructure: $75K (15%)
- Design & UX: $50K (10%)
- Contingency: $25K (5%)
previewExample.successmetrics:
**Key Performance Indicators:**
- User adoption: 1000+ registered users in month 1
- Revenue: $100K+ monthly recurring revenue
- Performance: <200ms average response time
- Quality: <1% error rate

**Measurement Methods:**
- Google Analytics for user metrics
- Application monitoring tools
- Customer satisfaction surveys
- Financial reporting dashboards
previewExample.quickstart:
**Get up and running in 5 minutes:**

1. Clone the repository
2. Install dependencies: `npm install`
3. Set up environment variables
4. Run: `npm start`

**First Example:**
```bash
# Start the development server
npm run dev

# Your app is now running at http://localhost:3000
```
previewExample.keyfeatures:
**‚≠ê Main Features:**
- Fast setup and deployment
- Built-in AI capabilities
- Scalable architecture
- Modern UI/UX

**Benefits:**
- Reduce development time by 60%
- Built-in best practices
- Enterprise-ready security
- Community support
previewExample.nextsteps:
**Continue Learning:**
- [Complete Documentation](./docs/)
- [Advanced Tutorials](./tutorials/)
- [API Reference](./api/)
- [Community Forum](./community/)

**Get Support:**
- GitHub Issues
- Discord Community
- Stack Overflow
- Professional Support
